column24: John Sr. worked at a copper mine in 1951 and 1952. In this film the house where the family lived can be seen in the background of some shots, its wooden siding is unfinished and looks gray. A year later John Sr. sold the house for 10x as much, $6,000. Inflation adjusted to 2025, that reflects a purchase price of around $7,200 and a sale price of $72,000.
